tpObject_list.tpObject: 43,574,454,0,Carson at first considered majoring in English and becoming a nonscientific writer.
534,571,444,0,Carson's three books about ocean ecology increasingly focused on the dangers humans posed to marine life.
44,649,454,0,The government considered Carson a valued expert and invited her input on ecological policy.
534,650,425,0,Many scientists doubted Carson's conclusions, causing her to write more books to support them.
43,728,466,0,The book Silent Spring has had both immediate and long-term influence on environmentalism.
534,729,434,0,Carson did much of her research by talking to people with everyday experience using pesticides.
